actions.name: all
actions.description: add all files, commit, and push

actions.name: branch
actions.description:
switch branches by selecting from a list. 
			You can also use the param 'go' to jump to a particular
			branch/selection:

go:		use 'go:3', for example, to jump to branch selection 3 from the 
		list. You can also use the expressive 'go:master' to jump
		directly to master

actions.name: remove
actions.description:
removes/deletes both local and remote branch.
			If you want to remove local only or remove remote only,
			you can use:

local:		'true' or 't', remove local only
remote:		'true' or 't', remove remote only
l:		shorthand for 'local'
r:		shorthand for 'remote'

actions.name: diff
re
actions.description:
restores version found in origin/master.  It runs 
			'git restore --source origin/master -- filepath'.
			Available options: 

file: 		specify by file name, such as 'qit re file:someFile.txt'
path:		specify by path
profile: 	'true', you can also do a batch of files: add the key 'restore'
		to your profile file.  Then, the 'restore' value will
		be a list element, including all of the files that you
		would like to restore

actions.name: reback
actions.description:
restores version of file from last commit in current
			branch

actions.name: status
actions.description: same as git status, but more fun!

actions.name: back
actions.description: go back to the previous checked out branch
